spec.name: Pirate
spec.subtitle: Nefarious Opportunists
spec.description: For these cunning "entrepreneurs" unafraid to break a few rules, take some risks, and resort to violence, anyone else's gains can become their own. The first law of piracy is that everything belongs to whomever can take it. However, this is an honorable profession, it's just business, and never personal. At least, it isn't until someone else makes it personal.

talents.name: Steely Nerves
talents.description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore effects of Critical Injuries on Willpower and Presence checks until the end of the encounter.

talents.name: Prepare to be Boarded!
talents.description: Once per encounter may take Prepare to be Boarded! action and make Opposed Coercion vs Discipline check against enemy ship captain. If successful, the enemy suffers 1 strain per uncancelled Success. The character may also spend 1 Triumph or 4 Advantage to inflict additional strain additional strain equal to ranks in Coercion. Should the enemy exceed his strain threshold as a result of resolving the check, he surrenders his ship.

talents.name: Altered Deal
talents.description: Once per session may take the Altered Deal action and make Hard Coercion check to radically change a previously made deal or bargain to the character's advantage.

talents.name: Natural Rogue
talents.description: Once per session, may re-roll any 1 Skulduggery or Stealth check.
